name: MadTracker Instrument
summary: An MTI file is an instrument used by MadTracker, a music tracker software for Windows. It contains information about an instrument that can be played back within MadTracker using MIDI data (maps notes to the instruments to play them). MTI files include samples , envelope settings, volume levels, panning, pitch modulation, and other parameters that define how it sounds when triggered by notes in a MadTracker project.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.
